Mon: "Hey, farmer." #!String
Mon8: "I'll tell you a secret... my name 'Sam' is short for 'Samson'.$10#$e#Most people don't know that so keep it on mute." #!String
Tue: "Oh, hi! It's good to see you again.#$e#Take it easy." #!String
Tue4: "Hi, @. Do you want to hang out or something?#$e#Sleeping feels nice but sometimes I wish I could skip it... it's just such a time-waster." #!String

Wed_20: "Hey, you know what? That sounds perfect. Thanks!$h" #!String
Wed6: "I've been friends with Sebastian for a while. He's a pretty cool guy.#$e#If you two weren't around I wouldn't really have any friends in town." #!String
Wed10: "Hey buddy. You look like you're full of energy today!^@. Um... I just wanted to say... You look nice today.$10" #!String

Thu6_1: "I think my Dad might be coming back in a year or so.#$e#I guess you might be able to meet him, then. If you're still living here.#$e#You wouldn't abandon the farm after putting so much effort into it!" #!String
Thu6_2: "...I have mixed feelings about my father being back. He seems strange.$s#$b#But I guess I haven't seen him in 3 years... so that could explain it." #!String
Thu_3: "*sigh*... what am I still doing here?" #!String
Thu: "The clouds look great this time of year, don't they?#$e#Like scoops of vanilla ice cream floating on blue raspberry sauce... Or maybe I'm just hungry." #!String
Thu2: "My Dad is a soldier, fighting against the Gotoro Empire. That's why he's not here...#$e#He'll come back someday.#$e#...I've heard some terrible things about the Gotoro Empire...$s" #!String
Thu_2: "Well, my Dad is back. Have you met him?#$b#I'm just glad he's okay." #!String
Thu2_2: "Well, my Dad is back. Have you met him?#$b#I'm just glad he's okay." #!String
Fri: "Did I ever tell you we used to live in the city?#$e#There's a lot more stuff going on, but it's also kinda noisy and hectic... It's hard to say which is better." #!String
Fri4: "Dad used to work as a garbage man in the city.#$e#You don't even want to know some of the things he found in people's trash." #!String
Fri10: "The older I get the more attached I feel to the valley.#$b#Although I could be biased... for a certain reason.$10#$e#So, how are you doing today?$h" #!String

Sat4: "Oh! I just remembered I'm supposed to call my Grandma. Okay, I'm going to put this rubber band on my wrist so I don't forget.#$e#I have to make little reminders for myself or else I'll totally forget to do things.$h" #!String
Sat: "Hmm. I just remembered that I was meaning to do something... But I forgot.#$e#This happens to me all the time." #!String
Sun8: "Sometimes I wonder if my mother is actually happy with her life...$s#$e#I asked her once and got the feeling she was hiding some inner pain." #!String
Sun: "Oh, it's a nice day... isn't it?" #!String
spring_21: "Sometimes those spring petals that float around make my nose drip.$s#$e#I like summer best, myself." #!String

spring_23: "Why couldn't the flower dance be today so I could get work off?$s" #!String

winter_7: "One time, Gus fell in the river during the Ice Festival. We had to build a huge fire in the saloon to dry him out.#$e#We were all worried we'd never taste his famous spaghetti ever again." #!String
fall_26: "Tonight, after everyone is asleep, that weird old man who lives in the woods will set up the haunted maze. He always makes sure no one is around to see him working." #!String
summer_10: "I don't have to work tomorrow! I've never been so happy.$h" #!String
winter_24: "The Feast of the Winter Star is supposed to be a time to show gratitude for all the good things in life.#$b#Me? I'm mostly interested in the food. Hehe.$h" #!String
event_room2: "Yeah... That's what happened!" #!String
event_snack1: "He's right... That's what happened.$s^She's right... that's what happened.$s" #!String
event_snack2: "Yeah... That's what happened!" #!String

summer_Mon2: "Hey, how's it going?#$e#I'm hungry.#$e#See you later." #!String
summer_Mon6: "Have you been to the desert yet?#$e#You can find some interesting things there. Dad took me a couple times when I was younger." #!String
summer_Mon: "There's a little less pollen in the summer... my nose is really happy." #!String
summer_Tue: "Oh, hi! It's good to see you again.#$e#Goodbye for now." #!String
summer_Tue4: "Hi, @. Do you want to hang out or something?#$e#I'm so energized during summer I hardly have to sleep!" #!String
summer_Wed: "Hi. Taking the day off?#$e#Sounds interesting." #!String
summer_Wed2: "I saw a spider on my ceiling last night. They sure like the warmth.#$e#I hope he didn't crawl into my mouth while I was asleep...$s" #!String
summer_Thu: "Dad was telling me about our national enemy, the Gotoro Empire... They sound like a ruthless bunch." #!String
summer_Thu6_1: "Sometimes I can hear my Dad pacing down the hallway at night.$s#$b#...But he won't tell us what's troubling him." #!String
summer_Fri: "You know... I used to live in the city and I have to admit, this place is much nicer in the summer.$h#$e#The city is so hot with all that concrete." #!String
summer_Sun: "When you see hot air balloons drifting over the sea, you'll know that summer's in full swing." #!String
fall_Mon2: "I like taking walks in the forest this time of year. The temperature is so comfortable#$e#...$h" #!String
fall_Mon: "Oh, hi. Are you making friends with anyone in town?#$e#Bye." #!String
fall_Tue: "My shoes always seem to wear out this time of year. Look, my toe's poking through!$h#$e#That's what happens when you skateboard too much." #!String
fall_9: "I ordered a new pair of shoes online. They're the same style so I know they'll fit right." #!String
fall_16: "I ordered some shoes online more than a week ago! Man, they're really taking a long time.#$e#I guess we must really live in the middle of nowhere.$s" #!String
fall_23: "Ah, my feet feel great in these new shoes. They're a little crisp, but they'll break in. Especially after I run through the haunted maze this weekend.$h" #!String
fall_Tue4: "Hi, @. Do you want to hang out or something?#$e#Just stop by whenever you want." #!String
fall_Wed: "Hey... something smells good, like pizza.#$e#Do you smell that? Maybe Mom's cooking something." #!String
fall_Thu6_1: "I think my Dad might be coming back next year.#$e#I guess that's kind of soon. Weird." #!String
fall_Thu6: "I guess I should start thinking about moving out soon...$s#$e#...But I would miss Mom's fish casserole, so I dunno...$s#$e#I hate making decisions." #!String
fall_Thu: "Did you ever notice all the spider webs that appear during the fall?#$e#If you get up early you'll see them covered in dew... like little stars." #!String

fall_Fri: "I used to live in Zuzu City, you know. The biggest difference is the noise. It's never quiet in the city.#$e#There's way more people around you, always. And it's always bright with city lights, even at night.#$e#I guess which setting you like depends on your personality." #!String
fall_Fri10: "I think I've grown to like the country more than the city.$h#$b#Although I could be biased... for a certain reason.$10#$e#So, how are you doing today?$h" #!String
fall_Sat4: "I'm lucky to have the biggest room in the house to myself.#$e#I guess there's advantages to being the oldest child." #!String
fall_Sat: "Hmm. I think I was meaning to do something... But I forgot.#$e#This happens to me all the time." #!String
fall_Sun8: "The first week of fall is already over. Man, that went by fast.$s#$e#Whatever. I'm just happy that you came to visit me!#$e#So do you have anything new to tell me?" #!String
fall_Sun: "It's hard to have fun on Sunday... I keep thinking about having to go to work tomorrow.$s" #!String
fall_14: "Hi @.#$e#Hmm.. I wonder if I could grow a cactus in my room?" #!String
winter_Mon2: "Everyone's indoors during the winter, so I can play guitar as loud as I want.$h" #!String
winter_Mon: "Hi... Cold, isn't it?" #!String
winter_Tue: "Oh, hi! It's good to see you again.#$e#Take it easy." #!String
winter_Tue4: "Hi, @. Do you want to hang out or something?#$e#Well, it's a good time of year to catch up on all the sleep I've missed.$h" #!String

winter_Wed: "$d Joja#I hate working at JojaMart, but how else am I going to make money in this town?|I'm glad I work at the museum now. It's way more interesting than that depressing JojaMart ever was." #!String
winter_Thu6_1: "I think my Dad is coming back this spring.#$e#It's been 3 years since I've seen him. This is going to be strange." #!String
winter_Thu6: "Dad's been back for a while now. I guess I'm finally getting used to it." #!String
winter_Thu: "My Dad is in the military, fighting against the Gotoro Empire. That's why he's not here.#$e#He's coming back soon, though." #!String
winter_Thu_2: "One thing that's nice about winter... all the mosquitos are gone." #!String
winter_Fri: "The worst thing about the snow is getting your feet soaked. You're lucky in those thick boots." #!String

winter_Sat4: "I just remembered I need to change the strings on my guitar.#$b#Okay, I'm going to write a note on my wrist so I remember to do it tonight.#$e#I have to make little reminders for myself or else I'll totally forget to do things.$h" #!String
winter_Sun8: "It would be fun if we could go sledding, wouldn't it?#$e#I don't think there are any good hills nearby.$s#$e#Plus, I don't have a sled.#$e#So, how have you been doing lately?" #!String
winter_Sun: "Try not to make a mess in the house or my Mom will flip." #!String
